activity.title: ohcnetwork/care#2531
activity.text: I noticed that there hasn't been a response from the contributor. Can I commit the changes mentioned? Please reply, @rithviknishad  @sainak .

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#8753
activity.text:
i have 2 solutions for this 
**Retrieve Coordinates and Display Map Button**: Use an API call to get the patient’s exact longitude and latitude based on their address, then store these coordinates in the backend. This allows for an option to display an interactive map using a button, providing precise location details when needed.
**or** 
Generate Clickable Google Maps URL: Convert the patient’s address into a clickable Google Maps URL and save it in their profile. This way, care providers can easily access the link and view the patient’s location without needing to embed a map directly. 
You can **assign** me if u like any !
